data.message: Hey Eminem i want to say smth to you..Look dude me and my girlfriend are you're biggest fan , I mean , she's crazy about you Em' and our biggest dream is to meet you. We talk about this everyday but we have a problem that we cant :'( :'( So please Em' please do smth to make our dream come tru cuz I want to propose her the day she'll meet you "Her Idol ^_^ " Help me please cuz i love her and she loves me and it would be magical if i made my proposal in front of you..We live in Albania so we can't effort to come in Detroit with our money , please Eminem do smth and conctact us..It would be an miracle if you do that , We will never forget it cuz you're our inspiraton ,our idol ,our role model , our Shady Love , our whole life ..Love you man <3 ( by me and my girl )
